title: The Eclipse Hotel
description: A dockerized Hotel Management application, Developed in Spring Boot with JPA/Hibernate and PostgreSQL.
longDescription: The Eclipse Hotel is a hotel management application designed to streamline operations for hotel staff and management. It includes features such as room booking, customer management, and billing. The backend is built with Spring Boot and JPA/Hibernate, while PostgreSQL is used for data storage. The application is containerized with Docker for easy deployment.
challenges: Ensuring data consistency across multiple modules
solutions: Used JPA/Hibernate for seamless database interactions
Implemented transaction management for data consistency
Optimized queries and caching for better performance

title: Serverless URL Shortener
description: A serverless URL shortener application built with AWS Lambda and DynamoDB, designed for high availability and low latency.
longDescription: This serverless URL shortener application allows users to shorten URLs and track their usage. Built with AWS Lambda and DynamoDB, the application is designed for high availability and low latency. It includes features such as custom aliases, analytics, and expiration dates for shortened URLs.
challenges: Ensuring low latency for high traffic
solutions: Used AWS Lambda for scalable serverless functions
Leveraged DynamoDB for fast and reliable data storage
Implemented scheduled tasks for URL expiration

title: Squad Management System
description: A Collaborators and Squads Management system and API Developed as a challenge for a back-end internship.
longDescription: The Squad Management System is an API designed to manage collaborators and squads within an organization. It includes features such as user authentication, role-based access control, and squad assignments. Built with NestJS and PostgreSQL, the system is containerized with Docker for easy deployment.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: The website you're currently browsing. Built with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Deployed on Vercel.
longDescription: This personal portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and experience. Built with React and Next.js, it features a responsive design powered by Tailwind CSS. The site is deployed on Vercel for fast and reliable hosting.
challenges: Creating a responsive and visually appealing design
Ensuring fast load times and performance
Organizing content effectively for user engagement
solutions: Used Tailwind CSS for rapid and consistent styling
Optimized images and assets for performance
Designed a clean and intuitive layout

title: CLI Matrix Commander
description: A command-line interface application focused on the mathematical manipulation of matrices, developed in pure Java using OOP best practices.
longDescription: The CLI Matrix Commander is a command-line application for performing mathematical operations on matrices. It supports operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and inversion. Developed in pure Java, it follows OOP best practices for maintainability and scalability.
solutions: Used modular OOP design for maintainability
Designed a user-friendly CLI with clear instructions
